name: Dodge The Arrows (Katsuhira)
description:
A small remake of Godot Docs "Dodge The Creeps!" learning sample project.

I thought to myself: Wouldn't it be an even better learning if I remake the sample project?
And now finally finished, as I probably spend more time on the menu than the actual game, I can say it was worth it!

New features (compared to the sample project):

  • Enemies reflect themselves!
  • A Dash! The classic.
    • If you dash through an arrow you can deflect them!
      • And you even get points for it! Wow, game design!
  • Custom controls
    • Supports keyboard, controller and mouse input
  • Really cool and super exiting--- Options! Wow!
    • You can save your stuff
      • Which is OptIn because lets be honest to ourselves: You will play this game for 3 minutes max and then never again
  • Statistics
  • No bugs! Probably.
